Params: {1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory45.jpg'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Nikola', 3: "It's 16:33. You're late by three minutes.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Nikola', 3: 'Hah... Maybe I should make an appointment the next time I want to see you, hmm?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Nikola', 3: "Forget it. Let's make haste. Asimov, are the equipment ready?", 4: '1'}

{1: '1', 2: 'Asimov', 3: "Well, the energy system and safety release valves are slightly different from Babylonia standards, but they're all based off of our tech, so it wasn't that hard to fix.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Nikola', 3: 'Just give me your conclusions.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Asimov', 3: "It's ready for use. It just needs to be tested for us to know for sure.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Nikola', 3: "I'm sure you know why you're summoned here. You're here today to test the team formation system developed by the ARU.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Why me?', 3: '10', 4: 'Team formation system?', 5: '11'}
{2: 'Nikola', 3: "You're the F.O.S. top graduate. You're the most ideal candidate for testing the system's limits. That's all.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Asimov', 3: "We found a program framework located in the Niflheim labs in the Arctic. It's old stuff, but the design direction is revolutionary and of great reference value.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Asimov', 3: 'After all, when it comes to war, people at that time were much more experienced than us.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Nikola', 3: 'Enough chit-chat. Any other questions?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Nope... Not that the moment.', 3: '14'}
{2: 'Asimov', 3: 'Alright. Then come here and put on this headset.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Nikola', 3: "It's not a deep dive kinda deal?", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Asimov', 3: "The ARU didn't have that sorta tech back then. This is just an audiovisual simulation program.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Nikola', 3: "It doesn't matter. Or maybe we can test your true mettle more accurately this way. Let's begin.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Asimov', 3: 'Okay. Here goes...', 4: '2'}
{3: 'As Asimov presses the start button, you hear the unstable electronic voice of a female AI.'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory0.png'}
{2: '-AI-', 3: 'Construct data upload—complete.'}
{2: '-AI-', 3: 'Tactical framework simulation generation—complete.'}
{2: '-AI-', 3: 'Virtual Horizon loaded. Welcome, Commandant.'}
